doc.title: Firefox OS

value.content:
Firefox OS is a discontinued open source mobile operating system developed by Mozilla. See Firefox OS for more details.

Firefox OS was also often called Boot2Gecko before the project had an official name.

doc.summary: Firefox OS is a discontinued open source mobile operating system developed by Mozilla. See Firefox OS for more details.
